original_text: He used bronze to make a large bowl for water, and a base for it to stand on. He used the bronze from small mirrors to make these things. The mirrors had belonged to women who worked at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 그가 놋으로 물두멍을 만들고 그 받침도 놋으로 하였으니 곧 회막 문에서 수종드는 여인들의 거울로 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: He used bronze to make a large bowl for water
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 청동을 사용하여 물을 담는 큰 대야를 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: and a base for it to stand on
He used the bronze from small mirrors
The mirrors had belonged to women
who worked at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting
